lender.name: Global Private Funding
lender.whereabouts: Amsterdam * Colombo * Dubai * London * New York * Shanghai * Singapore
lender.loan_because:
*** Page maintained by Michelle Taylor, Managing Director - Asia Pacific Operations ***
In most cases, it's harder to find a lender for $100.00 than finding a lender who will lend a $1,000,000.00. It almost always is that person who is looking to borrow a $100.00 that needs it the most. It's a matter of survival to a family. We do what we do so that others may prosper.
"How many lives have you touched today?" Sam Francis Senev, Chairman & CEO
GPF is currently seeking opportunities within Asia, Arabic Speaking Countries and Europe. While the Japanese, Chinese, Indians and the Middle Eastern nations have invested heavily within the US and Europe for mainly prestige and glamour, and while the US and European economies have benefitted by the foreign underwriting their national debts, GPF invests strategically in opportunities that are less glamorous yet fiscally sound and sustainable in developing nations. Traditionally nations with excess wealth such as the Middle East have had difficulty investing within their own nations external to servicing their niche market. GPF has found opportunities servicing those outlying financial needs within those countries.
Global Private Funding, ‘a perfect marriage between dollars and good sense’.
lender.occupational_info:
Global Private Funding Ltd. invests in developing economies supporting large scale industrial assets such as factories, resorts, banks and logistics. GPF is a third party lender and does not lend directly.
If you are interested in submitting a prospectus to GPF, please have your commercial banker contact GPF at info@globalprivatefunding.com.
If you live in a country where there isn't a Kiva Field Partner, or you for some reason want to contact us directly, please send an email to michelletaylor@globalprivatefunding.com. Your request will be given priority and reviewed with Dr. Senev as Kiva is his very personal cause.
***** If you are looking for a specific loan, please note that this page only contains a sampling of the loans, while primarily lending is done via three other accounts that are anonymous. *****

lender.name: NovaGod
lender.loan_because:
It makes us as a corporation feel as if we are doing something good for others & not just sitting here playing games on the PC, We should think ourselves lucky to even have one nor have the time to sit down & play around.
We are a group of people from around the world that raise money to loan to kiva by playing a game.
We play a game called EVE, It is a space based game where you fly around in your ship mining doing missions or just going around attacking other players. Very in depth game play with a huge market of items to trade & corporate share markets
With the extra game money made in game that the corp does not need is then traded & sold to other players & then the real money is formed from the games play money & sent to kiva as a loan. Once the loan is paid off the money then go's back to the shareholders of the corp & paid back as dividends. & round & round it go's.
So where not only just playing a game but at the same time helping change lives around the world.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I feel very privliaged in my life and what I have. I think by giving someone else a chance they can feel that too.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I have been very blessed in my life to have many good people help me in my times of need. I believe we should give back by helping others in need as much as we can. I know I would not be the person I am today without the blessings my mentors have given me. May God bless all of them and all of you as well. Thanks

lender.name: Omtara1008
lender.loan_because: If you want happiness for an hour, take a nap. If you want happiness for a day, go fishing. If you want happiness for a month, get married. If you want happiness for a year, inherit a fortune. If you want happiness for a lifetime, help others. ~ Chinese proverb
lender.occupational_info: Midwife of Compassionate Change in consort with those who are willing.

lender.name: jenna
lender.loan_because: I'm am interested in becoming an entrepreneur, and i look forward to what my money can do for others.

lender.occupational_info: I design, art direct and manage a team of designers and art directors focused primarily in advertising.

lender.occupational_info: I have travelled to many third world countries and have seen first hand how hard these people work with the little they have. It gives me great pleasure to help.

lender.loan_because: i want to expand my small computer shop business to be able to accommodate all of my customer.
lender.occupational_info: i own a computer shop business here in the philippines island.

lender.name: Ravi
lender.loan_because: I believe that it is the right of every human being to life a life of dignity and honor. The man-made socio, economic and political conditions sometimes leaves people with an unfair disadvantage that is frustrating. I hope that through the institution of micro finance that imbalance can be corrected with far reaching consequences.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a large company that looks after trade related functions and it is my job to manage software projects that will ease the process of conducting trade across borders.

lender.occupational_info: Computer Technician with small business (Computer shop with 5 units)

lender.occupational_info: Its business that has more market and the sales rate is good because of the technology it has it it the computer world as its modern and a new thing that every one wants to know and own a computer on its own

lender.name: Kelly, Matt, Lea

lender.name: Steve
lender.occupational_info: Develop computer software. Also formed a non-profit called Equitas (www.equitas.cc), dedicated to providing advocacy and relief in five key areas: genocide, HIV/AIDS, human trafficking, poverty, and clean water.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to help others achieve what they want, I admire these people that are not looking for handouts but are truly looking to improve their situation by themselves

lender.name: Gloria
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.

lender.name: Denise

lender.name: Guilherme

lender.name: Inger

lender.name: Erik
lender.loan_because: We are entrepreneurs and simply enjoy giving other entrepreneurs and small business owners opportunities to launch/grow their own businesses. And, because, we realized long ago that giving feels better than receiving!
lender.occupational_info: I am an American entrepreneur and business man operating out of Tokyo, Japan. I've built up several businesses - some successful - some not. When it comes to giving, I think of Zig Ziggler's famous quote, "You can have everything in life you want if you'll just help enough other people to get what they want!"

lender.loan_because: I was taught to give help to people who need it. I love how Kiva works and wish they had a memorial fund to donate to as well.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from teaching, so now I am a volunteer crisis counselor at our county jail and teach Vietnamese adults English pronunciation.

lender.name: Westlund Family

lender.name: Amy & Joe
lender.loan_because: We can.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a librarian at a law school; I also index books on international topics. My husband, Joe, is a manager at a store for wine, beer, cheese and other specialty items. We're both foodies, so we generally make loans in the food and agriculture sectors.

lender.name: Lorenzo
lender.loan_because: "...heal the world, make it a better place.."

lender.name: Kadee
lender.loan_because: It's a small way that I can give back. I like the idea of microloans.
lender.occupational_info: I write and do accounting during the day, and sing at night.

lender.name: Lauren & John
lender.loan_because: It is our honor and obligation to help the larger World community.
lender.occupational_info: We teach biology to college students and do our own research on insects. John studies ants in North and South America, Lauren studies mantids and grasshoppers in Southern Africa.

lender.name: Lara
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lender.name: Jan

lender.occupational_info:
I use mathematics and computers to model the interactions between organisms and their environment. I build these model ecosystems by simulating multiple species' evolution with my computer code. This process creates hypotheses about the likely characteristics of an ecosystem that will make it vulnerable to invasion by exotic species.
I also sell fair trade children's clothes online -----v
